name: The Fifth Apartment
description:
The old lady lives a frugal and lonely life on apartment number 5 of Mont Sinaï building. But who could be lonely with all the demons of a lifetime?

"Having lived inside her skin and experiencing the unspoken torment of isolated domesticity, you come to understand these women we so readily call "crazy."", KILL SCREEN

"... a uniquely unsettling little game", FORBES

CONTROLS
- Left and right arrow to move.
- Space to Interact.
